intro_text: The patrol lies in ambush, concealed around the narrow rocky gully leading to a deep shadowed pool of water. app1 spots a gila monster ambling into range, striped red and black, and purrs with dark amusement as the prey approaches its doom.
decline_text: There'll be smaller, easy prey lured into this trap. The patrol lets the monster pass without a fight.

success_outcomes.text: p_l waves a tail across app1's path, stopping {PRONOUN/app1/object} with a stern stare. Remember the venom in the fangs of that monster. Don't count your prey until it's on the fresh-kill pile. r_c nods, and apologizes. Every hunt deserves respect.

fail_outcomes.text: app1 leaps down in a beautiful ambush that bounces right off the gila's tough hide. The lizard hisses, striking backwards with its fangs, and escapes, leaving app1 to limp home.

history_text.scar: m_c was permanently marked by the bite of a gila monster as an apprentice - but {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} survived.
history_text.reg_death: m_c died from the bite of a gila monster encountered on a hunt as a foolish apprentice.
history_text.lead_death: from the bite of a gila monster encountered on a hunt as a foolish apprentice
